dct_description_sm: compiled, drawn & printed under the direction of F. J. Salmon.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
3 bar scales on map given in "Miles", "Kilometres", and "Metres".

Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, roads, railways and stations, aircraft landing grounds, post offices, police stations, cemeteries, churches, mosques, synagogues, and places of historical interest.
Includes 2 legends: [Sites of interest] -- Altitude scale.
3 inset maps: Haifa -- Jerusalem -- Jaffa & Tel Aviv.
